title: Boy Dies in Birthday Party Shooting
content:
Police aren't sure whether a shooting at a birthday party on the city's west side at midday was intentional, or an accident.
But what they do know is a 16 year old boy is dead, and another 16 year old is being questioned.
"They celebrated the birthday last night, apparently they spent the night and at some point this morning they were playing with a gun," Sgt. Javier Salazar said.
Police were called to an apartment complex at Hamilton and Ceralvo about 11:30 this morning on a report of a shooting. When they arrived, they say the boy was already dead from a gunshot wound to the head.
"The suspect pointed the gun at the victim's head and pulled the trigger," he said. We are trying to determine what the suspect's intent was, and if he knew the gun was loaded."
No word on what charges the 18 year old might face.
